paper_abstract: We show that graphs generated by collapsible pushdown systems of level 2 are tree-automatic. Even if we allow epsilon-contractions and reachability predicates (with regular constraints) for pairs of configurations, the structures remain tree-automatic whence their first-order logic theories are decidable. As a corollary we obtain the tree-automaticity of the second level of the Caucal-hierarchy.
paper_title: COLLAPSIBLE PUSHDOWN GRAPHS OF LEVEL 2 ARE TREE-AUTOMATIC
